text: Bucs’ Donovan Smith: "Risking my health, as well as my family's health, does not seem like a risk worth taking. ... I am not a lab rat or guinea pig to test theories on. I am a man, a son, brother, soon to be father, and I deserve to be safe at work." https://t.co/Hx2A2JOfuY
